item.description: US equity futures take a pause after a record-setting week for stocks. President Trump maintains that there was “no tension” in his meeting with Fed Chair Powell as they toured the central bank’s reno

item.title: Global Stock Rally Loses Steam; Trump Downplays Clash with Fed Chair | Bloomberg Brief 7/25/2025
item.description: US equity futures take a pause after a record-setting week for stocks. President Trump maintains that there was “no tension” in his meeting with Fed Chair Powell as they toured the central bank’s reno

item.title: Earnings Expectations a ‘Bit Removed From Reality’: UBS
item.description: Bhanu Baweja, chief strategist at UBS, says markets are looking for a US economic renaissance that his firm doesn’t see a catalyst for amid investor complacency on the impact of tariffs.

item.title: Earnings Expectations a ‘Bit Removed From Reality’: UBS
item.description: Bhanu Baweja, chief strategist at UBS, says markets are looking for a US economic renaissance that his firm doesn’t see a catalyst for amid investor complacency on the impact of tariffs.

item.title: Ex-Star Trader Tom Hayes Wins Bid to Overturn Libor Conviction
item.description: Tom Hayes, the former star UBS Group AG trader who became the face of the Libor rigging scandal, overturned his criminal conviction, clearing his name a decade after his jailing.

item.title: Wall Street’s Prime Brokerage Boom Lures European Rivals
item.description: The industry’s revenue from prime brokerage is expected to hit a record $30.8 billion this year and European banks are hustling to get a bigger piece of that action.

item.title: Market Seeking Confirmation of Growth: UBS’s Lovell
item.description: UBS Global Wealth Management Senior US Equity Strategist Nadia Lovell discusses earnings expectations. She speaks with Romaine Bostick on “The Close.” (Source: Bloomberg)
